attributes.action: Call for the resignation of Margaret Hodge MP
attributes.additional_details: Barking and Dagenham voted by 62.44% to leave. Maybe Margaret should rethink her position within her constituency?
attributes.background: Following the outcome of the EU referendum, Margaret Hodge called for the resignation of Jeremy Corbyn. If Jeremy is to be ousted as Leader maybe Margaret should resign for such an awful result in her constituency.
